meanings.def: the act or process of making or producing something
examples: making of something the making of social policy

meanings.def: to make somebody become a better or more successful person
examples: University was the making of Joe.

meanings.def: to have the qualities that are necessary to become something
examples: Her first novel has all the makings of a classic.
He has the makings of a first-rate lawyer.

meanings.def: in the process of becoming something or of being made
examples: This model was two years in the making.
These events are history in the making.

meanings.def: created by you rather than by somebody/something else

idioms.def: to make somebody become a better or more successful person
examples: University was the making of Joe.

idioms.def: to have the qualities that are necessary to become something
examples: Her first novel has all the makings of a classic.
He has the makings of a first-rate lawyer.

idioms.def: in the process of becoming something or of being made
examples: This model was two years in the making.
These events are history in the making.

idioms.def: created by you rather than by somebody/something else
